name: sparskit

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: debug
variants.description: Builds a debug version of the library

description:
SPARSKIT: A basic tool-kit for sparse matrix computations (Version 2).
Made by Yousef Saad, University of Minnesota.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependent_to.name: octopus
dependent_to.description:
A real-space finite-difference (time-dependent) density-functional
theory code.
